name: Untitled space game (Gamejam Colors²)
description:
Your goal is to reach the highest score by collecting the projectile.

To collect a projectile it must hit the shield of the same color.

If it hits a shield of a different color if you are in normal mode it will add the color to the projectile and if in negative mode it will remove the color from the projectile.

You loose when you try to add a color that you already added to a projectile or when you try to remove a color that can't be removed.

Controls : 

Move : ZQSD

Rotate : MouseButton

Change to negative dimension : Spacebar

Restart : R
